comments.body: can drop this check, if SeccompProfile != nil, type must be valid

_Pretty sure_ this caused issues because some fixtures were being generated like

```
securityContext:
  seccompProfile: {}
```

but will triple check.

that won't pass API validation:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/59e5b849c9439375575f6ced54fb9e2364b58797/pkg/apis/core/validation/validation.go#L3771-L3779

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/59e5b849c9439375575f6ced54fb9e2364b58797/pkg/apis/core/validation/validation.go#L3823-L3833

if it doesn't pass API validation, it never makes it to PodSecurity admission
